The Waiter is a man who works in a restaurant who was seen in [[The One With The Blind Dates|2]] [[The One Where Joey Tells Rachel|episodes]] of the series while the friends are on dates. He is homosexual, as he was attracted to both [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]], stating that in his opinion Joey was "really cute" and flirting with Ross when the latter stated that '[Ross] really wanted to have sex [that night].'
